metadata.feature_description: Displays top community contributors with their engagement metrics and avatars

steps.actual: Successfully logged in as SuperUser Account

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard should load with top users sections
steps.actual: JavaScript error 'utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' prevents dashboard from loading. Panel displays blank/empty content.

steps.action: Refresh page and retry accessing Community Analytics
steps.actual: Same JavaScript error occurs consistently. Dashboard panel remains blank.

issues: Critical JavaScript error: 'TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' in social-dashboard-instance.js at dashboardClass.init()
Community Analytics dashboard fails to initialize and displays blank panel
Error occurs consistently on multiple attempts

steps.action: Attempted to view top users section in Community Analytics
steps.expected: Top users should display with avatars in table format
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature cannot be tested due to dashboard initialization failure

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to user profiles on click

steps.action: Attempted to click on user to navigate to profile
steps.expected: Clicking a user should navigate to their profile via utility.loadPanel('users', params)
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature cannot be tested due to dashboard initialization failure

steps.action: Attempted to view user metrics (topSpectators, mostActiveUsers, powerRankings)
steps.expected: Should display three sections: Top Spectators, Most Active Users, and Power Rankings with engagement values
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature cannot be tested due to dashboard initialization failure

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test empty state when no users

steps.action: Attempted to verify empty state display
steps.expected: Should show 'No Data Available' message when no users exist (per code: resx.topCommunity_NoDataAvailable)
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Feature cannot be tested due to dashboard initialization failure

observations: Code analysis shows the Top Community Users Display feature is implemented in communityUsers.js as a Knockout component that renders users in a table with avatar, displayName, and value columns
The component supports navigation to user profiles via utility.loadPanel('users', params) function
Empty state handling is implemented: shows placeholder rows with '-' when fewer than 5 users, and 'No Data Available' when no users
Three user categories are displayed: topSpectators, mostActiveUsers, powerRankings - each limited to 5 users (TOPCOMMUNITY_MAX_USERS = 5)

Critical bug discovered: The social-dashboard-instance.js file calls utility.serializeCustomDate() but this function is not available on the utility object during initialization, causing the entire Community Analytics dashboard to fail to load
The bug prevents ANY testing of Community Analytics features including Top Community Users Display
